pnut

Predict neutrino underground telemetry.

Functions to load SN models and process event rates.

sspike.pnut.basic_events(sn, detector)

Estimate ibd and electron scatter events for cross-checking.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation details.

  • detector (sspike.detector) – Detector for simulations.

Returns

df – IBD and electron event rates for cross-checking with SNOwGLoBES rates.

Return type

pd.Dataframe

sspike.pnut.dxs_nc(E, T_p, a=1)

Neutral-current double differential cross-section.

Parameters

  • E (float) – Neutrino energy in GeV.

  • T_p (float) – Proton recoil energy in GeV.

Returns

dsig – Differential cross-section in with respect to proton recoil energy with units of cm^2 / GeV.

Return type

float

sspike.pnut.e_scat(sn, detector)

Electron-neutrino scattering events.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation details.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Name of SNOwGLoBES detector.

Returns

df – Summed neutrino-electron events for cross-checking with SNOwGLoBES.

Return type

pd.Dataframe

sspike.pnut.elastic_events(sn, detector)

Proton-neutrino elastic scattering events.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation details.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Name of SNOwGLoBES detector.

Returns

sspiked – Neutrino-proton neutral-current event rates by flavor.

Return type

dataframe

sspike.pnut.event_totals(sn, detector, save=True)

Sum event totals from snowglobes_events() and sspike_events().

Parameters

sn (sspike.Supernova) –

Returns

df – 3 column dataframe: file_type, channel, events.

Return type

pd.DataFrame

sspike.pnut.fluence_tarball(sn)

Generate fluences tarball via snewpy and extract in sn.bin_dir.

Parameters

sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation specifics

sspike.pnut.get_fluences(sn)

Get fluences generated by snewpy and update record.

Parameters

sn (sspike.Supernova) – Supernova specifics.

Returns

df – Energy [GeV] and fluence by flavor [cm^-2].

Return type

pd.Dataframe

sspike.pnut.get_luminosities(sn, save=True)

Save luminosity vs. time for each flavor in dataframe format.

Parameters

sn (sspike.Supernova) – Supernova simulation specifics.

Returns

df – Simulation times [s] and flavor luminosities [erg / s].

Return type

pd.DataFrame

sspike.pnut.ibd_events(sn, detector)

Inverse beta decay events.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation details.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Name of SNOwGLoBES detector.

Returns

df – Inverse beta decay event rates for cross-checking with SNOwGLoBES.

Return type

pd.Dataframe

sspike.pnut.nc_events(T_p, E, f, E_min, scale=1)

Integrate neutrino differential cross-section and fluence w.r.t. energy.

Parameters

  • T_p (float) – Proton recoil energy $[MeV]$.

  • E (np.array) – Neutrino energies $[MeV]$.

  • f (np.array) – Neutrino fluence $$

Returns

E – Electron equivalent energy in KamLAND.

Return type

np.array

sspike.pnut.quench(T_p)

Convert proton recoil energy to electron equivalent energy.

Parameters

T_p (np.array) – Proton recoil energies of interest $[MeV]$.

Returns

  • E (np.array) – Electron equivalent energy in KamLAND.

  • Note – Quenching factors using WebPlotDigitizer on Fig. 6 in: https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0168900210017018

sspike.pnut.snowglobes_events(sn, detector, save=True)

Process fluences with SNOwGLoBES via snewpy.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation details.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Detector for simulations.

Returns

dfs – Events for each type of SNOwGLoBES data.

Return type

dict of pd.Dataframe

sspike.pnut.sspike_events(sn, detector, save=True)

Process event rates using sspike functions.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Simulation details.

  • detector (sspike.detector) – Detector for simulations.

Returns

dfs – Event rates for sspike data types.

Return type

dict of pd.Dataframe

sspike.pnut.vis_totals(sn, detector, save=True)

Select visible events from all totals.

Parameters

  • sn (sspike.Supernova) – Supernova simulation specifics.

  • detector (sspike.Detector) – Detector information.

Returns

df – DataFrame of event totals and progenitor properties.

Return type

pd.DataFrame
